mapper.insert: insert into comment_board(cm_num, cm_title, cm_content, mi_num, credat, cretim, moddat, modtim, cm_cnt) values(seq_cm_num.nextval, #{cmTitle}, #{cmContent}, #{miNum}, to_char(sysdate,'YYYYMMDD'), to_char(sysdate,'HH24MISS'), to_char(sysdate,'YYYYMMDD'), to_char(sysdate,'HH24MISS'), #{cmCnt})
mapper.select: select * from comment_board where cm_title = #{cmTitle} and mi_num = #{miNum}
